message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to start the negotiations at $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $110 is still outside my budget. I'm happy to pay $90 for it.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90, Bob. I'm willing to compromise at $105, which is my best offer so far. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but $105 is still a bit high. I'm willing to go up to $95. This is my final offer.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but $95 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $105, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer.
